lamparski.areabase.fragments

Class SubjectListFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • lamparski.areabase.fragments.DetailViewFragment
        • lamparski.areabase.fragments.SubjectListFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAreabaseFragment

    public class SubjectListFragment
extends DetailViewFragment
    Shows a list of subjects (and the number of datasets they contain) for a given Area. The items are links which, when clicked, should take the user to the SubjectViewFragment for the corresponding Subject.
    Author:
    filip
    See Also:
    Subject, SubjectViewFragment, Area
